encodingDesc.p: ed. JW 11MR06, 18MY16; √'d JW 23MY14 agt WILH; 23 emended JW 27SE16; remark about 14 del JW 10FE17; EMENDED JW 10FE17, 11FE17; 18 emended per MD 16MR17; 28 emended per MD 17MR17; 17n emended JW 20MR17; 18 unemended per MD 5AP17; 28 Rupis emended to rumpens per MD 10AP17; 28 emended per MD 14AP17

lg.l: Dear Tom, I'm surpriz'd that Your Verse did not jingle
But Your Rhyme was not double, cause yr sight was but single
For as Helsham observes there's nothing can Chyme,
Or fit more Exact than One Eye and One Rhyme.
If You had not took Physick, I'd pay off Your Bacon
But now I'll write short, for fear You're short taken.
Besides Dick forbid me, and call'd me a Fool
For he says short as 'tis it will give You a stool.
In Libris bellis tu parum parcis ocellis;
Dum nimium scribis, Vel Talpâ cæcior ibis,
Aut ad Vina redis, nam sic tua Lumina Lædis.
Sed tibi Cœnanti sunt Collyria tanti?
Nunquid eges Visu dum comples omnia risu?
Heu! Sheridan cæcus, heu eris nunc Circopithecus
Nunc bene Nasutus mittet tibi carmina tutus,
Nunc ope Burgundi malus Helsham ridet Abunde
Nec Phœbi fili Versum ·pro potes. Hor:. quis mittere Ryly
Quid Tibi cum Libris, relavet tua Lumina ·pro quovis fluvio: Virg:. Tybris
Mixtus ·Saccharo saturni. Saturno, penso sed parce diurno
Observes hoc tu, nec scriptis utere noctu.
Nonnulli mingunt, et palpebras sibi tingunt
Quidam purgantes, libros in stercore nantes
Linquunt, sic Vinces, Videndo, mi bone Lynces.
Culum Oculum tergis, dum scripta hoc flumine mergis.
Tunc Oculi et Nates, ni fallor agent tibi grates.
Vim fuge Decani, nec sit tibi cura Delani,
Heu tibi si scribant, aut si tibi fercula libant
Pone loco Mortis rumpens fera pocula fortis,
Hæc tibi pauca dedi, sed Consule Betty Mi Lady,
Huic te des Solæ, nec Egebis Pharmacapolæ.
«LD»Hæc somnians cecini
